root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 10-1-2, translated into en
root.data:
Data is available every 2 years from 2010-2018 disaggregated by urban/rural area.

Data on the spending growth rate of the poorest 40% of the population has not been released compared to the national average.

(Published source: 2020 national report on 5-year progress towards implementation of sustainable development goals)
